name: 12 Labours of Hercules XVI: Olympic Bugs
name_original: 12 Labours of Hercules XVI: Olympic Bugs
description:
Olympian gods sought to simplify human lives by creating sentient machines to assist them in their tasks. Initially, all ran smoothly: the mechanical aides quickly learned and tirelessly worked for the betterment of humanity. However, one fateful day, chaos erupted. Explosions echoed from Hephaestus’ forge, triggering a rebellion among the machines!



Now, humanity's last hope rests on Hercules, embarking on a quest to uncover the cause, pacify the rogue machines, and neutralize the impending threat. His journey traverses treacherous terrains, from towering mountains to perilous locations infested with hostile mechanisms, leading to the brain of Artificial Intelligence. Will the hero's strength be enough to vanquish this malevolent genius? Nevertheless, Hercules is determined to stand firm against the machines fighting for humankind!



Join forces with the hero on an enthralling odyssey, delve into the depths of AI's mind, catch the bugs, and confront a myriad of unexpected challenges. Embark on this captivating journey right now! Play “12 Labours of Hercules XVI: Olympic Bugs”!



  • Discover a new Game Speed setting with Hercules by your side!
  • Explore sublevels, bonus levels, super bonus levels and extra super-bonus levels!
  • Join Hercules in a thrilling quest, delve into AI's secrets!
  • Juggle tasks, catch bugs, and save mankind!
  • Interactive guide
  • Wallpapers
  • Additional bonus levels
  • Fascinating journey to Elysium
